page.title: 09 WORCESTER SWIMMING POOL 2
page.content: On Wednesdays class 7 go swimming at 10.30.Some people go in the big pool and some in the little pool.When we get in the learner pool we swim round in a rectangle shape.We all learn to swim.On our first time we all have arm bands and a polystyrene board.When we can swim we try to earn badges-green, white,red,blue and personal survival. When I go on my own it is different because the ropes are not in the water.There is sometimes a dragon to play on.It costs 80p for adults to go in and 30p for children and O.A.P's . There are also private baths there.People go there to have a bath because there are still some old houses in Worcester with no bathrooms. There are Turkish baths too,where people go to slim and get fit.
